mapper.insert: insert into bill (BId, BType, BNum, BPrice, BMonth, BTitle, BDate) values (#{bid}, #{btype}, #{bnum}, #{bprice}, #{bmonth}, #{btitle}, #{bdate})
mapper.update: update bill set BType = #{btype}, BNum = #{bnum}, BPrice = #{bprice}, BMonth = #{bmonth}, BTitle = #{btitle}, BDate = #{bdate} where BId = #{bid}
mapper.select: select BId, BType, BNum, BPrice, BMonth, BTitle, BDate from bill
